statements: SELECT * FROM Regulatory_Submissions LIMIT 5;
SELECT submission_name, regulatory_status, submission_date FROM Regulatory_Submissions WHERE health_authority = 'FDA';
SELECT submission_name, submission_date FROM Regulatory_Submissions ORDER BY submission_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT health_authority, COUNT(*) AS submission_count FROM Regulatory_Submissions GROUP BY health_authority;
SELECT submission_name, regulatory_status FROM Regulatory_Submissions WHERE regulatory_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY submission_name ASC;
SELECT submission_id, submission_name, submission_date, health_authority, regulatory_status FROM Regulatory_Submissions WHERE submission_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Regulatory_Submissions WHERE health_authority = 'FDA';
SELECT submission_name, submission_date FROM Regulatory_Submissions WHERE submission_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT submission_id, health_authority FROM Regulatory_Submissions WHERE regulatory_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY submission_id DESC;
SELECT submission_id, submission_name, submission_date FROM Regulatory_Submissions WHERE health_authority = 'EMA' AND regulatory_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY submission_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_submissions;
SELECT submission_name, submitting_organization FROM regulatory_submissions;
SELECT submission_id, submission_date, submission_name FROM regulatory_submissions ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM submission_documents WHERE submission_id = 1;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM submission_documents WHERE document_type = 'Report';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_submissions WHERE submission_id = 1;
SELECT submission_name, submission_date FROM regulatory_submissions ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT submitting_organization, COUNT(submission_id) AS num_submissions FROM regulatory_submissions GROUP BY submitting_organization;
SELECT * FROM submission_documents WHERE document_type = 'Report' AND document_name LIKE 'Intro%';
SELECT submission_name, document_name FROM regulatory_submissions JOIN submission_documents ON regulatory_submissions.submission_id = submission_documents.submission_id;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_submissions;
SELECT submission_id, submission_type FROM regulatory_submissions WHERE submission_type = 'New Submission';
SELECT submission_id, submission_date FROM regulatory_submissions WHERE submission_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM health_authorities ORDER BY authority_region DESC;
SELECT submission_id, status_type, status_date FROM submission_status ORDER BY status_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_submissions WHERE submission_type = 'New Drug Application';
SELECT submission_id, submission_type FROM regulatory_submissions WHERE submission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT submission_id, submission_type, submission_date FROM regulatory_submissions WHERE submission_type = 'Premarket Approval';
SELECT * FROM health_authorities WHERE authority_region = 'Europe' ORDER BY authority_name DESC;

SELECT hs.status_id, rs.submission_type, hs.status_type, hs.status_date FROM submission_status hs JOIN regulatory_submissions rs ON hs.submission_id = rs.submission_id WHERE hs.status_type = 'Approved' ORDER BY hs.status_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_submissions;
SELECT submission_type, submission_date FROM regulatory_submissions;
SELECT * FROM submission_documents WHERE document_type = 'Protocol';
SELECT document_name, document_path FROM submission_documents WHERE submission_id = 1;
SELECT reviewer_name, reviewer_role, reviewer_comments FROM submission_reviewers WHERE submission_id = 2;
SELECT submission_id, submission_type FROM regulatory_submissions WHERE submission_type = 'New Drug Application';
SELECT * FROM submission_documents WHERE document_type = 'Cover Letter' ORDER BY document_name DESC;
SELECT reviewer_name, reviewer_role FROM submission_reviewers WHERE submission_id = 1001 AND reviewer_role = 'Lead Reviewer';
SELECT submission_id, submission_date, health_authority, submission_details FROM regulatory_submissions WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM submissions_follow_ups ORDER BY follow_up_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_submissions;
SELECT submission_name, submission_date FROM regulatory_submissions WHERE submission_id = 1;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM submission_documents WHERE submission_id = 2;
SELECT reviewer_name FROM submission_reviewers ORDER BY reviewer_id DESC;
SELECT submission_id, comment_text, review_date FROM submission_review_comments WHERE reviewer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_submissions;
SELECT submission_name, submission_date FROM regulatory_submissions ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM submission_documents WHERE submission_id = 1;

SELECT reviewer_name, review_date FROM submission_reviewers INNER JOIN submission_review_comments ON submission_reviewers.reviewer_id = submission_review_comments.reviewer_id WHERE submission_review_comments.submission_id = 1;
SELECT approval_status, approval_date, approved_by FROM submission_approvals WHERE approval_status = 'Approved';
